snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie. The Edith and Carl Marks Jewish Community House of Bensonhurst mourns the loss of Julie Rosefsky, the sister of our dear friend and distinguished board member Yale Fergang. On behalf of all of Yale's friends at the "J", we send our sincerest condolences on this great loss. Our hearts are with you at this difficult time. Alex Budnitsky, CEO Jonathan Gold, Chairman 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEFSKY--Julie. The Edith and Carl Marks Jewish Community House of Bensonhurst mourns the loss of Julie Rosefsky, the sister of our dear friend and distinguished board member Yale Fergang. On behalf of all of Yale's friends at the "J", we send our sincerest condolences on this great loss. Our hearts are with you at this difficult time. Alex Budnitsky, CEO Jonathan Gold, Chairman 1/3
